Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1980...
Traded from New Jersey to Bay City on 7/7/1980 (Going to NJ: CF J. Castilla. Going to BC: P G. Brito, C W. Armenta, 3B B. Austin)...
Injured on 7/13/1981 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1981 with a Broken Ribs, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/5/1985, off John Watchman (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/3/1986, off Roger Maddocks (Mal)...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/22/1991 to a 5-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/11/1991 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against West Texas on 5/17/1992...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
